reviews.title: Some scary crap
reviews.comment: I was home alone one night because my mom and dad where gone and it told me to move and everything started to shake.
reviews.author: Kenneth Justice

reviews.title: Good Entertainment
reviews.comment: Its a cool app that wont get you bored easily.
reviews.author: Sarn K

reviews.title: Totally freaked out
reviews.comment: For a few months now we have thought there is something in our house that has followed us from a paranormal investigation and we have thought it to be demonic this confirmed what we have thought and what our dog has been sensing as well
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: This thing is freaky
reviews.comment: Whether it\'s real or not, I\'m totally freaked out. While it was blinking red, I told it to make a noise and I heard foot steps in our kitchen, like we often do at night time. Very weird.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: update
reviews.comment: the last update took away the \"no sleep mode\" now after a few second of not touching my phone goes to sleep and programs pauses..... please fix and i would do 5 stars, everything else i love about this app :)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Don\'t understand
reviews.comment: Not sure how to use it but its ok I guess
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: I Am no Asian. No understand
reviews.comment: I dont get it...no instructions.  It seems totally fake.  ghosts and demons are filled on the screen.  lol its retarded using an amulet to purify the area?? wth?  stick with ghostspeaker or ghost radar.  i have most of the ghost apps and these 2 are still my fav.  the entity sensor with evp (9.99) is awesome. it records evps when the magnetic fields around you are super unusually high.  neways DONT DO IT!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Need to fix
reviews.comment: Center point is off. Won\'t fit on my LG Optimus V. Anyway it works and it\'s cheap.
reviews.author: A Google User
